Articles.Content: Oh hai, I would like somebody to play with me, but nobody from my friends has got time to do so (They are mostly from America and so, and I'm from SK). So, would somebody like to play with me? I got a lot of good loot, and if I can trust them, I can also give them a FN42 (or whatever).
I was thinking about getting this, I heard it is pretty buggy. Ive got a friend here(in the states) who plays as well. I guess I need some convincing lol

I was thinking about getting this, I heard it is pretty buggy. Ive got a friend here(in the states) who plays as well. I guess I need some convincing lol

Nah, some clipping there and there. But nothing major

Nah, some clipping there and there. But nothing major

Accept ladders can easily be mistaken for banana peels and send you flying off into the distance. In all seriousness, stay away from ladders.

Edited March 12, 2014 by Leonov
